amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for research on the Long Range Stand Off Weapon (LRSO).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 51 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to specify that none of the funds made available by this act may be used for research on the Long Range Stand Off Weapon (LRSO).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A110) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 289, 1 Present (Roll no. 353).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A110) Failed by recorded vote: 138 - 289, 1 Present (Roll no. 353).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A110) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
